alert.note: Alert for Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 10:41PM EDT until July 11 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Shiawassee County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 1145 PM EDT. * At 1041 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Laingsburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Laingsburg around 1050 PM EDT. Owosso and Perry around 1100 PM EDT. Morrice around 1105 PM EDT. Corunna around 1110 PM EDT. Bancroft around 1115 PM EDT. Durand around 1120 PM EDT. Byron and Lennon around 1125 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bennington and Vernon. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
